col_0: Desire for MDE support:  communication, models, training, etc.
Flexibility in plan development & implementation; local control
Keep plan simple, feasible, realistic, reasonable, manageable
Unique schools:  small, rural, charter, intermediate, itinerant staff
Plan is research-based, appropriately measures all staff, & tied to PD
Timeline & legislative feedback for initial implementation
Difficulty of juggling all responsibilities & required mandates
